name: Extreme Race Car:Mountain Road
description:
Extreme Race Car: Mountain Road is the continuation of the series where top sims and simulator games and such fun car games and simulator games that you drive the Lamborghini or Lamborghini reventon on the extreme environments and drive your Lamborghini and furious car.
**Game Features **
1. Easy to learn and drive super cars.
2. 3d realistic Car driving cars.
3. Simulator like controls
4. Interesting 3d environments
5. Real driving tracks
